scripts.afterinstall: cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod install && pod update && cd ../
scripts.bundle-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.map --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
